#Text=Karen traditional  Ta Ka Phaw " will give you the feeling of warm in during the cold season .

column1: #Text=People might not often see this Karen dish in shops because it is special and if you cannot cook well the dish will not turn out well .
#Text=By following the following steps carefully , tough , you will be able to accomplish it .
#Text=Ingredients
#Text=Five raw bamboo shoots
#Text=Fresh basil leaves
#Text=Drumstick leaves
#Text=1 kg fish or chicken
#Text=2 djenkol beans
#Text=2 tbsp of fish pate
#Text=Black pepper
#Text=Five to ten green chili peppers
#Text=Salt
#Text=Soaked pounded rice powder
#Text=Serves two people
#Text=Steps
#Text=Slice five bamboo shoots into small pieces .
#Text=Mix with some salt and boil it for 30 minutes .
#Text=Pour its liquid to another pot .
#Text=Your bamboo shoot must be raw to be able to test good .
#Text=Your raw slide bamboo shoot needs some salt to add when boiling it because salt will make it tastier .
#Text=However , you must be careful with adding salt because you will have to add one more time during you cook .
#Text=Cut the fish or chicken into small pieces and put it in the liquid .
#Text=If needed put more some water until it boils .
#Text=You should not put the whole body of the fish or all of the chicken without adding something .
#Text=To be able you dish smell good , both fish and chicken have to be roast before boiling with bamboo shoot liquid .
#Text=Put some two table spoon of fish pate , some slat again and slide djenkol bean into the boiling water and keep boiling it until 15 minutes .
#Text=In this step you are going to add salt again .
#Text=So , if you add a lot of salt for the first time your dish will be salty .
#Text=Too much fish pate will cover the smell of the fish or chicken roast .
#Text=So , I recommend not to put more than two table spoon of fish pate .
#Text=Djenkol bean must test good , after you cook , but if you are allergic with djenkil bean , you will not include it in your ingredient .
#Text=Especially , for the pregnant women .
#Text=Put basil leaves first , follow by drumstick leaves , and powder black pepper keep boiling it more for 3 minutes and wait until it boils again .
#Text=That 3 minutes will mix the leaves with ingredient .
#Text=To put chili pepper into the pot is your choice .
#Text=If you like spicy , you can include chilly , but if not up to you .
#Text=My recommendation is when you are cooking this dish in cold season make this spicy otherwise the test will not be delicious .
#Text=Hot and spicy will help you to get warm .
#Text=Add pounded rice that you had sink into water when it boils again after 3 minutes for the lest step .
#Text=There are two ways we can make the rice powder .
#Text=The first way we can get it by sink rice we need and pound it .
#Text=The second way is we toasted the rice .
#Text=These two ways have different result .
#Text=The sink rice when we pound it , it sticks inside mortar and take more time .
#Text=It does not give us good smell when we cook it .
#Text=Toasted rice are better but it takes little bit of time when we toasted it .
#Text=However , it going well when we pound and give us good smell when we cook .
#Text=If you like good smell and delicious dish , use toasted rice .
#Text=Keep boiling it and it up to you .
#Text=If you want to eat with some liquid or not .
#Text=After this step you are ready to have Karen " Ta Ka Phaw " dish .
#Text=Hope you find way easy to cook Karen " Ta Ka Phaw " dish by using these steps and enjoy your " Ta ka Phaw .
